items.title: United Airlines adds Mexico's Riviera Nayarit in 3-route winter expansion
items.description: United Airlines is expanding to the Riviera Nayarit and Mexico City in Mexico, and Punta Cana in the Dominican Republic this winter.

items.title: The best credit cards to add to your wallet
items.description: A look at some of the best credit cards according to Nick Ewen, one of TPG's longest-tenured staffers and current senior editorial director.

items.title: Maximize the Citi Trifecta: Why you should add these 3 cards to your wallet

items.title: Allegiant Air eyeing Wi-Fi for its planes, 'studying' premium seats
items.description: Budget airline Allegiant Air expects to add inflight Wi-Fi in the future, and has confirmed past talks with Starlink about onboard service.

items.title: Chase Sapphire Reserve vs. Amex Gold: A top luxury travel card against a top foodie card
items.description: The American Express Gold is one of the only nonpremium cards that can give the Chase Sapphire Reserve a run for its money.
